forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am, then areas of fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 60. East northeast wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
